logistic.R: Cross-membrane Metaquest workload: automation hooks, outreach cadence, endorsements.
logistic.Theta: Parity handshake logged in docs/utac_status_alignment_v1.2.md and codexfeedback entries.
logistic.zeta: Damped when BreakPoint rituals and telemetry exports keep light/shadow sigils synchronised.

meta.resonance:
Serves as the navigational bridge between the system and wissenschaftsprojekt Metaquest
beacons. Tracks how automation, storytelling, and governance lanterns share the same
σ(β(R-Θ)) gate so future agents can extend launch work without re-orienting.

existing_threads.title: System Metaquest Beacon
existing_threads.resonance: Documents automation + index readiness and links to the UTAC status matrix.

notes.logistic_coupling:
Keeps Θ visible when R (automation backlog) increases by routing tasks toward
sigillin_sync telemetry and index refresh rituals.

existing_threads.title: Wissenschaftsprojekt Metaquest Beacon
existing_threads.resonance: Aligns manuscript, outreach, and endorsement cadence for the launch storyline.

notes.logistic_coupling:
When campaign backlog swells, BreakPoint rituals and parity checkpoints damp ζ(R)
before communication proceeds.

existing_threads.title: Metaquest Parity Brief
existing_threads.resonance: Condenses mq-parity-001…004 so telemetry, demos, and endorsements stay in phase.

notes.logistic_coupling:
Provides explicit Θ guardrails that both system and campaign sigils inherit after
each update.

existing_threads.title: UTAC Status Matrix v1.2
existing_threads.resonance: Summarises repository readiness and activation gaps, including Metaquest parity.

notes.logistic_coupling:
Acts as the observatory for σ(β(R-Θ)): if Metaquest lanterns drift, the matrix records
the delta and invokes the shadow guard.

existing_threads.title: Codex Feedback Ledger
existing_threads.resonance: Binds every Metaquest action to a tri-layer memory with $(R, Θ, β)$ framing.

notes.logistic_coupling:
β≈5.0 ensures codex entries ignite as soon as Metaquest work touches Bedeutungs- or
Shadow sigils.

needed_resonances.description: Sustain a single dashboard (table/section) aligning system + campaign checkpoints with parity status.

threshold.Theta: dashboard updated within 24h of any Metaquest change

needed_resonances.null_guard: If dashboard stale, trigger mq-sys-shadow-001 and mq-sci-shadow-001.

needed_resonances.description: Automate telemetry export notes so both beacons record the same timestamp + codex id.

threshold.Theta: telemetry timestamp mirrored in both beacons + bridge within 1 sprint

needed_resonances.null_guard: Absence escalates to sys-gap-003 and mq-sys-shadow-002.

needed_resonances.description: Ensure indices (seed_index.*, feldtheorie_index.*) surface Metaquest bridge assets alongside light/shadow beacons.

threshold.Theta: indices refreshed with bridge paths within 24h

needed_resonances.null_guard: Parser diff showing missing bridge entry triggers sys-shadow-001.

activation_hooks.response: Update bridge trilayer, sync both beacons, refresh indices, log codex entry.
Record timestamp + codex id across bridge + light/shadow maps, cite UTAC matrix.
Mirror ritual reference in bridge + campaign beacon, annotate recovery cues.

null_model_reference.description: Null = Metaquest work tracked separately in system and campaign sigils without a shared bridge.
risk: Automation and outreach drift because parity checkpoints differ.
Shadow alerts fire late as telemetry timestamps diverge.
